languages.text: "Повышенная активность"... Другими словами, кто-то очень заинтересован в обнаружении планеты, набитой десятиной, — и он близок к успеху?"

traits.locale_text: "Повышенная активность"... Другими словами, кто-то очень заинтересован в обнаружении планеты, набитой десятиной, — и он близок к успеху?"

languages.text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"
languages.original_text: "Повышенная активность"... Другими словами, кто-то очень заинтересован в обнаружении планеты, набитой десятиной, — и он близок к успеху?"

traits.locale_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"
"Increased activity? Marshal, do you suspect that someone is trying to find their way to the planet?"
"‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"
"‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"
"Increased activity? Marshal, do you suspect that someone is trying to find their way to the planet?"
"Increased activity? Marshal, do you suspect that someone is trying to find their way to the planet?"
"Increased activity? Marshal, do you suspect that someone is trying to find their way to the planet?"
"‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

languages.text: « Une "activité accrue"... En d'autres termes, quelqu'un cherche à localiser un monde regorgeant de richesses... et serait sur le point de réussir ? »
languages.original_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

traits.locale_text: « Une "activité accrue"... En d'autres termes, quelqu'un cherche à localiser un monde regorgeant de richesses... et serait sur le point de réussir ? »

languages.text: «"Un aumento de actividad"... En otras palabras, hay alguien a quien le interesa mucho localizar un mundo lleno de diezmos, y está a punto de conseguirlo, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

traits.locale_text: «"Un aumento de actividad"... En otras palabras, hay alguien a quien le interesa mucho localizar un mundo lleno de diezmos, y está a punto de conseguirlo, ¿no?».

languages.text: “‘频繁的活动迹象’……也就是说，有人迫切想要找到那颗满载什一税资源的行星，而且很快就要找到了，对吗？”
languages.original_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

traits.locale_text: “‘频繁的活动迹象’……也就是说，有人迫切想要找到那颗满载什一税资源的行星，而且很快就要找到了，对吗？”

languages.text: "Verstärkte Aktivitäten ... Anders gesagt ... jemand versucht nach Kräften, eine vor Zehnt strotzende Welt zu finden ... und ist fast am Ziel?"
languages.original_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

traits.locale_text: "Verstärkte Aktivitäten ... Anders gesagt ... jemand versucht nach Kräften, eine vor Zehnt strotzende Welt zu finden ... und ist fast am Ziel?"

languages.text: 「活動の活発化？将帥、誰かが惑星への道を見つけようとしているってことなのか？」
languages.original_text: "Increased activity? Marshal, do you suspect that someone is trying to find their way to the planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「活動の活発化？将帥、誰かが惑星への道を見つけようとしているってことなのか？」

languages.text: "Artan bir hareketlilik mi? Yani birisi aşarla dolu bir dünya bulmanın peşinde ve bunu başarmak üzere mi?"
languages.original_text: "‘Increased activity'... In other words, someone is very interested in locating a world brimming with tithe — and is close to succeeding?"

traits.locale_text: "Artan bir hareketlilik mi? Yani birisi aşarla dolu bir dünya bulmanın peşinde ve bunu başarmak üzere mi?"
